alert.note: Alert for Clay; Duval; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 2:36PM EDT until August 15 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... Northeastern Clay County in northeastern Florida... Southeastern Duval County in northeastern Florida... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 236 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Orange Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Unf, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Jacksonville Beach, Neptune Beach, Fleming Island, Baymeadows, Nocatee, and Ortega. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
